newsitem.title: USA: James River to open plant in Russia.
newsitem.headline: James River to open plant in Russia.

text.p: James River Corp said Thursday it will open a tissue converting plant outside of Moscow.
The company said it has signed a long-term lease agreement for the site and expects the converting lines to be operational in the fall.
The converting plant will initially include two bathroom tissue and two napkin converting lines and employ about 30 people, said the company.

The output from this plant, combined with sales of other items sourced directly from the company's European mills, are expected to generate 10,000 tons per year of incremental tissue sales in the next three to four years.
